meanings.definition: A person who takes a test.
meanings.sent1: The testee answered all the questions on the exam.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out the test to each testee in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The testee accidentally brought a calculator to a spelling test.
meanings.sent4: The nervous testee felt like a tiny fish in a big pond of questions.
meanings.sent5: The diligent testee studied hard to prepare for the important test.

meanings.definition: An object or material being tested.
meanings.sent1: The scientist observed the testee under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The new fabric was the testee in the durability experiment.
meanings.sent3: The testee, a new cleaning solution, bubbled and fizzed in the beaker.
meanings.sent4: The testee metal endured extreme temperatures in the lab.
meanings.sent5: The testee plant showed promising growth in the controlled environment.
